list_definition.definition: a warm covering made of wool etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I put an extra blanket on the bed.

list_definition.definition: something which covers like a blanket

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: A blanket of mist covered the mountain.

list_definition.definition: covering all of a group of things

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: A blanket instruction was issued to all employees.

list_definition.definition: to cover, as if with a blanket

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The hills were blanketed in mist.

The anesthetized cat was put in a stereotaxic frame, and a heating blanket placed underneath to prevent hypothermia.
